text: Oedipus Rex (Edipo re) is a 1967 Italian drama movie directed by Pier Paolo Pasolini and was based on the 428BC play of the same name by Sophocles. It stars Silvana Mangano, Franco Citti, Alida Valli, Luciano Bartoli, Carmelo Bene and was distributed by Arco Film. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1967 drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Moroccan movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Pier Paolo Pasolini Category:Italian-language movies Category:Incest in movies
title: Oedipus Rex (1967 movie)
